text: Alain G. Anderton is an author of business studies and economics textbooks for use in secondary education in the U.K.. He has written GCSE and A-level Economics textbooks (Economics for GCSE and Economics respectively), as well as a book on business studies. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:British economics writers Category:British textbook writers Category:British business writers
title: Alain Anderton
